translations: n．慢吞吞的人，行动迟缓的人：指那些做事缓慢、没有创造力或独特见解的人。

sentences.sentence: Forget hours of work, English dons insist: the world holds both quick learners and plodders. What matters is what a student has learned.
sentences.translation: 别看工作时间，英国导师们坚持道，世上既有脑子灵快的，也有慢而勤奋的，关键是学生学到了什么。

sentences.sentence: Or, even if some star bankers are worth a lot, there are an awful lot of plodders paid large sums simply for occupying desks in trading rooms.
sentences.translation: 或者，尽管一些明星银行家确实值这些钱，简单地说，将会有大批得到高薪的实干银行家们坐满交易室。
